metadata.name: Underwater Depths
metadata.description:
In her otherworldly realm, where reality and dreams blur their boundaries, the echoes of her mournful song reverberate throughout the vast, infinite expanse. Her face, veiled by the interplay of shadows, unveils the intricate enigma of her emotions, a nuanced dance between truth and illusion. Her existence bears witness to the ephemeral nature of love, a delicate equilibrium of light and darkness.

The ocean's vortex, with its unseen currents and spectral remnants, embraces her limitless world and cradles her heart, flickering like a beacon in the dimly lit abyss. Siren of longing, her melancholic cries weave an eternal narrative transcending the confines of language and time.


Video 21 seconds and Prose Poem.
Concept, AI CoIlab and Post-Productionby Mariela Di Nardo.
